message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,500,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm confident in the value this product offers, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000. I believe this reflects a fair price considering its potential.
I appreciate you coming down to $1,350,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. Can you meet me at this price?
